Sign Up Successful

Tok3n strongly recommends that you add additional phone numbers or other account recovery options. An account cannot be fully secured with a single recovery method.

We'll walk you through adding Tok3n two-factor authentication to your exisiting apps in just a few easy steps.

Mobile App

To verify your account with the Tok3n mobile app, you'll need to download the app on an iOS or Android device. Search for Tok3n in the App Store (iOS) or Google Play Store (Android). Once you're ready, hit the button below and we'll display a unique barcode. Scan the barcode with the Tok3n app and you'll be ready to go!

Link Your Device

Stuck? We can send you an SMS message to verify your phone number.
